snippet.title: NT News: their best front pages revealed
snippet.content:
THE NT News is one of a kind when it comes to newspapers. Its headlines are the among the most hilarious and most outrageous in the country. If it's not a yarn about a crocodile eyeing a fisherman as bait, it could be a yarn about a flying dildo, or a dog killed by a yowie. No one takes the NT News too seriously, including the people who work there. But when it comes to headlines, there are few better at the craft. And they certainly get people talking.
Today, NT News takes a look at their best over the past five years.
